title: Changing Team Info and then Upgrading
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has prevision version of MiLB First Pitch installed
AND the user has selected a favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN the user upgrades to the latest version of First Pitch

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a favorite team added
AND we change that team's teamid via the teams xml
AND we upgrade First Pitch to the next version
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then after First Pitch has been upgraded we are able to open the app successfully
AND the team which was changed will no longer be present in the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a favorite team added
AND we change that team's teamid via the teams xml
AND we upgrade First Pitch to the next version
AND we reopen the app after the upgrade
AND we tap on the team picker
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the team picker will open successfully
AND we are able to tap on the different teams in the list

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the team has undergone a change

i.e.
- team name change
- team id changed
- team affiliate changed
- team logo changed

AND the user upgrades to new version of the app
and adds that team(s) as a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be able to select the team and navigate through the app, the app should not crash
